content: That's really helpful. I think I'll set up my coupon binder with separate sections for grocery coupons, retail store coupons, and expiring soon. I'll also use pocket pages to keep them organized. Speaking of grocery coupons, I've been trying to maximize my savings by combining sales with coupons and cashback apps like Ibotta. Do you have any tips on how to find the best deals and sales at stores like Kroger?
